item.title: 使用slice
item.description: 加入兩個座標到陣列 {{ $pages := slice}} {{ $pages := $pages | append (dict "x" 1 "y" 1) }} {{ $pages := $pages | append (dict "x" 2 "y" 2) }} {{ $pages1 := slice}} {{ $pages1 := $pages1 | append (dict "x" 3 "y" 1) }} {{ $pages := append $pages $pages1 }} {{ range $pages }} {{.x}} <br/> {{end}} 🏷{{ $pages}} <br/> {{/* 只是看一下甚麼是 array of dict */}} 把partial當成一個副程式,傳回一個陣列: 對照上面的寫法,我要測試是否能把partial 當成副程式。

"} article[autonumbering] h3:before {counter-increment: h3; content: counter(h2) "." counter(h3) ". "} article[autonumbering] h4:before {counter-increment: h4; content: counter(h2) "." counter(h3) "." counter(h4) ". "} article[autonumbering] .toc__menu ul { counter-reset: item } article[autonumbering] .toc__menu li a:before { content: counters(item, ".") ". "; counter-increment: item }
